name: App3dtv channel builder project
short_description:
Hi – Can anyone assist here? 

We want to try and create dedicated URL video player pages for our clients. The link needs to offer -

1 -Embedded options  - JW Live player to the main body.
2- A header / banner drag and drop option for the client. 
3- In the Footer we need a time line builder that connects to the live player. 

Happy to talk with anyone about this project build. Our website will be on line next month. www.app3d.tv . The clients will simply log in / drag and drop video to a footer time line and click broadcast now. Is this possible as a turn key basic channel building solution?. Can anyone build this for me? Thanks Elton CEO app3d.tv LTD
summary: Request a Channel Building Drag and Drop UI
